articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: Brics steers clear of a position on Ukraine crisis, seeks peaceful resolution - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Johannesburg II Declaration outlined the approach of Brics towards several foreign policy and sustainable development issues and supported India’s proposal for including the African Union as a G20 member | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI: The Brics grouping on Thursday steered clear of taking a position on the Ukraine crisis, with member states only saying that they welcome mediation aimed at resolving the conflict through … [+5437 chars]
